name: On-Demand Somm
description: ON-DEMAND-SOMM is a platform for wine enthusiasts to record their tasting notes.
technical: On-Demand Somm is a responsive, React, and Ruby on Rails web application. Full CRUD capabilities.
languages: JavaScript, React, Ruby, Ruby on Rails, CSS, Axios, React-Router-Dom, Auth, BCrypt, JWT

name: Weather-Now
description: Weather-Now allows users to input their city name and retrieve current weather information.
technical: Worked with the OpenWeather API, created an async function that fetches weather data from third party API. Weather-Now is a responsive application for mobile and tablet screen sizes.

name: Pets-R-Us
description: *Collaboration* Pets-R-Us is a full (Mongo/Express/React/Node) MERN stack application that allows local animal adoption agencies to post their adorable animals. The following is a list of the features: our application has full CRUD on the back-end, and utilizing the React framework on the front-end.

name: ChandlerManly.com
description: Personal Website using React for the front-end and flexbox for styling.

name: Blog App
description: Collaboration: my contribution was on the create post page functionality and styling. Deployed via netlify.

name: Oui Chef
description: A web-application where users can contribute personalized recipes.
technical: Airtable for back-end, full CRUD, React, components and life cycle methods, props and state, React Router

name: Dev-Training
description: A web-application that provides an interactive study guide for aspiring software developers.
technical: This web-appliction is responsive for phones and tablets.This app has full CRUD and has a quiz, written in JavaScript, feature to test the users knowledge on basic react concepts.

name: Healthy Smoothies
technical: Full CRUD web application. API call to Airtable database.
